titleInfo.title: Harry and Morris Hoffman Standing Inside Hoffman Liquor Store

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#970 Harry Hoffman in front of father's store 1929 and father in Hoffman's Liquor, 1936." Handwritten on back of photograph: "Harry Hoffman & father, Morris Hoffman, an early president of BMH, 1936, standing in front of Harry Hoffman Liquor, #970."

mods.abstract: Harry Hoffman and his father, Morris, pictured in the 1950s, stand next to a display at Denver's landmark Hoffman Liquor Store. The liquor establishment was founded in 1937.
mods.note: Appears in, ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' By Dr. Jeanne Abrams on page 45.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
